attributes.title: What a great app except...🤪🤪🤪
attributes.review: I got this app because I LOVE our hottie of a president Donald J Trump❤️❤️ I may be a lesbian but oh boy he might change my mind. Who wouldn’t love a Cheeto faced guy who is homophobic, transphobic, racist, xenophobic, narcissistic, and sexist! He really knows all the ways to make every person who is not a straight, white male feel special🥰💫❤️💫💖💖 I wanted to show support for my president in any way I could, so of course I got the app! I was so excited when I first clicked on because I knew that thousands of others of my generation were doing it with me, showing their true feelings towards our president, Mr. Donald Duck😃🥰💖 Now the app took longer that usual to download, but hey, nobody is perfect! But that took away a Star right there, buddy. Anyways, when I clicked on I felt a deep sensation of wrong in my gut, like when you’re going in for your fifth spicy taco even though your stomach has already consumed the maximum capacity of hot sauce it can take🤢🌮Anyways, the app finally loaded and when the login page popped up, I screamed! I couldn’t believe the app could display such a disturbing image right on the login page. The creature had a clenched fist raised high in aggression, and it’s bulging black eyes showed no remorse😪 Not to mention the orange, dusty tone of its skin! No, I couldn’t take it. I immediately ran into my bathroom and puked up my republican juice I drink every morning🤮🤮🤮 I refuse to open the app again for the disgusting images it showed me. The makers of this app should be ashamed of themselves for showing such horrendous content without warning. If I could give it a negative rating, I would😡😤😡
